title: I need 27 RP for Skin Orb. I drew a Picture :(
body:
Hello, it's been a while I started playing League again and I started playing again because of a friend. I'm honestly happy to be back. 
I am just a bit sad because I just need 27 RP for a project skin orb which is 250RP in total. I have 223 RP. 
I didn't want to get a key or a chest because it would leave more left over RP and I'm scared I'll get a champion shard from a chest. 

In my best effort, I drew the project skin orb. Please Riot send for help :( 
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Meme art is best art!  Don't be sad, you might see that some poros left goodies in your account.  Thanks for the drawing!

Thank you so much <3 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

edit: I got pool Party Reksai, Mecha Zero Sion! and +100 Orange Essence! All from the one Skin Shard Orb you helped me get :D 
That's an epic skin shard, legendary skin shard and some orange essence! Although it's going to take some time saving up enough orange essence, it's definitely something I can do with enough patience. Thank you so much!
